tool_description: Get instant access to Puerto Rico active property listings from Clasificados Online. This includes for-sale listings, long-term rental listings, and short-term rental listings with the Puerto Rico real estate data API.
name: Puerto Rico Real Estate
title: Puerto Rico Real Estate

api_list.name: Property Search
api_list.description: Search for property for-sale listings in a geographical area. Returns the property features, image url,  and coordinates.

required_parameters.name: town_id
required_parameters.description: List of town names can be found on [Puerto Rico Towns Coverage | Area o Pueblos](https://bit.ly/3RweCGr)

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following options: apartamento|apartamento/walkup|casa|comercial|finca|multifamiliar|solar. Default is all.

optional_parameters.name: opt
optional_parameters.description: Options filter. Set it to 1 if needed.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number if at the previous response max_page > 1

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: One of the following options: 1|2|3|4|5|>6. Default is all.

optional_parameters.name: repo
optional_parameters.description: Repossessed filter. Set it to 1 if needed.

api_list.name: Short-Term Rental Search
api_list.description: Search for short-term rental listings in a geographical area. Returns the property features, image url,  and coordinates.

required_parameters.name: town_id
required_parameters.description: List of town names can be found on [Puerto Rico Towns Coverage | Area o Pueblos](https://bit.ly/3RweCGr)

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: One of the following options: 1|2|3|4|5|>6. Default is all.

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following options: apartamento|apartamento/walkup|casa|comercial|finca|multifamiliar|solar. Default is all.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number if at the previous response max_page > 1

api_list.name: Long-Term Rental Search
api_list.description: Search for long-term rental listings in a geographical area. Returns the property features, image url,  and coordinates.

required_parameters.name: town_id
required_parameters.description: List of town names can be found on [Puerto Rico Towns Coverage | Area o Pueblos](https://bit.ly/3RweCGr)

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following options: apartamento|apartamento/walkup|casa|comercial|finca|multifamiliar|solar. Default is all.

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: One of the following options: 1|2|3|4|5|>6. Default is all.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number if at the previous response max_page > 1

api_list.name: Rental Town by Id
api_list.description: Search all long-term and short-term rental town options
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://puerto-rico-real-estate.p.rapidapi.com/long_term_rental/filters/towns"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "puerto-rico-real-estate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
